Edit Basic HtmlÂ¶

Note

This badge is incomplete, and intended to show some basic usage on your editor. Grab a guide, and they will figure out something appropriate :)

  1. Make a basic html file in your editor.
  2. View it in your browser.
  3. Make changes.
  4. Observe changes in your browser!
  5. Be amazed that changing a few lines of code can change output!
